main

Class Pacman

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Figure
      • main.Character
        • main.Pacman

  • public class Pacman
extends Character
    Pacman class.
    Pacman class extends the Character class.
    This class is used to manage the Pacman character in the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Benoît Martel, Yoann Le Dréan
    See Also:
    Character

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The direction of Pacman.
      private boolean hasPower
      Pacman is powerful.

      The basic image of pacman with closed mouth.

      The basic image of pacman with open mouth.

      The power image of pacman with closed mouth.

      The power image of pacman with open mouth.
      private java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageActualCl
      Modified image of pacman with closed mouth.

      Modified image of pacman with open mouth.

      Pacman's mouth is open.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pacman

        Pacman(Tile tile)
        Constructor of the class Pacman.
        Create a Pacman object.
        As a parameter of the constructor, the tile on which Pacman is located when it's created.
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile on which Pacman is located when it's created.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(Tile nextTile)
        Description copied from class: Character
        Abstract method move. This method allows to move the character in another tile.
        Specified by:
        move in class Character
        Parameters:
        nextTile - the tile in which the character has to move

      • setDirection

        void setDirection(Direction d)
        This method allows you to change the direction of Pacman's move. Depending on the direction, Pacman's mouth changes direction.
        Parameters:
        d - the new pacman direction.

      • getDirection

        Direction getDirection()
        This method retrieves the direction in which is pacman.
        Returns:
        the direction in which is pacman.

      • setWantedDirection

        void setWantedDirection(Direction wantedDirection)
        This method allows you to change the wanted direction of Pacman's move.
        Parameters:
        wantedDirection - the wanted direction

      • getWantedDirection

        Direction getWantedDirection()
        This method retrieves the wanted direction in which is pacman.
        Returns:
        the wanted direction.

      • getHasPower

        boolean getHasPower()
        This method allows to know if pacman is powerful or not.
        Returns:
        true if pacman is powerful, false otherwise

      • setHasPower

        void setHasPower(java.lang.Boolean power)
        This method allows to put pacman powerful or not.
        Parameters:
        power - true, pacman becomes powerful, otherwise becomes normal again

      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        This method allows you to retrieve the image of pacman to come later to draw it. At each call of this method, the mouth comes alive. Once the mouth is open, the call to this same method the next time returns the image of pacman with the mouth closed
        Specified by:
        getImage in class Character
        Returns:
        pacman's image according to his direction

      • rotateImage

        private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage rotateImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                                        double angle)
        This static method makes it possible to rotate the pacman image according to an angle passed in parameter.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to rotate
        angle - the angle in which the image must rotate (degree)
        Returns:
        the new image rotated
